item.title: Backing up GPG key with YubiKey, Tomb and Cryptosetup
item.description: In this short post, i will show how to generate secure GPG keys using secure liunx enviroiment and other secure linux tools. Steps that we'‘ll go through are: Generate a live secure enviroiment (TAILS) Generate GPG-Keys Diging secure tombs and forging keys Backing-up keys and revocation certificates Backing up keys in crypto LUKS drive SECURE ENVIRONMENT Lets make a working folder where we create file, keys, tombs ad so on.
